about_the_game: Rebekah never felt like a normal teenager. She was bullied at school and felt like her family never listened to her. Her fortunes did not improve when she ends up getting caught up in the nefarious plans of Eric Uman, an upstart politician and his evil right hand man, Magus. As the end times of mankind approach, one teenage girl must learn about ridicule, loss, love, and redemption in this film about the end of days.
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Rebekah never felt like a normal teenager. She was bullied at school and felt like her family never listened to her. Her fortunes did not improve when she ends up getting caught up in the nefarious plans of Eric Uman, an upstart politician and his evil right hand man, Magus. As the end times of mankind approach, one teenage girl must learn about ridicule, loss, love, and redemption in this film about the end of days.
legal_notice: Copyright 2016 Nuts and Volts Electronics (Credited as Uber Visor films)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: A young girl and her family get caught up in a dangerous situation after the girl's father believes the new President to be the Beast of Prophecy mentioned in the Book of Revelation.
